page.title: 10BISHOP SUTTON PLAYGROUP
page.content: The playgroup meets in the Methodist Hall on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday mornings.There are 14 boys and twelve girls at present between the ages of three and five.Activities include imaginative and creative play, manipulative skills, and experiences with water, sand, books, music, and cooking.There are many constructional toys and a climbing frame.Each child is given a mid morning drink of milk. Jumble sales and other fund raising activities are held regularly to help purchase new equipment.Fees are 75 pence per child daily. The playgroup is registered with the Social Services Department and is organised by its own committee. It is run by two qualified supervisors helped by a rota of enthusiastic mothers.The playgroup has served the community continuously for 16 years.
